author: Kevin Beary
description: Full-flavoured rum and pineapple with delicate coffee and a refreshing zing of lemon citrus.
name: Mr. Bali Hai
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass/mug filled with crushed ice
